name: ETFMG Prime Mobile Payments ETF
description: The ETFMG Prime Mobile Payments ETF (IPAY) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to provide investment results that correspond generally to the price and yield performance of the Prime Mobile Payments Index. Launched in 2018, this ETF focuses on companies that are involved in the mobile payments industry, which includes businesses that facilitate mobile transactions, digital wallets, and other financial technology solutions aimed at enhancing payment processing and consumer convenience. As mobile payments continue to gain traction globally, driven by technological advances and changing consumer behaviors, IPAY invests in a diversified portfolio of companies that are positioned to benefit from this growth trend. The fund holds a range of companies, from payment processors and software developers to those engaged in the infrastructure and hardware necessary for mobile payment solutions. The ETFMG Prime Mobile Payments ETF aims to capture the growth potential of this innovative sector while providing investors with exposure to the evolving landscape of financial technology.

seo.meta_title: ETFMG Prime Mobile Payments ETF (IPAY) | Investment in Mobile Payments
seo.meta_description: Explore the ETFMG Prime Mobile Payments ETF (IPAY), an investment opportunity focused on the rapidly expanding mobile payments industry and financial technology solutions.

faq.question: What does IPAY invest in?
faq.answer: IPAY invests in companies involved in mobile payments and financial technology.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ETFMG?
faq.answer: Sam Masucci is the CEO of ETFMG.

faq.question: Where is IPAY headquartered?
faq.answer: IPAY is headquartered in Summit, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of IPAY?
faq.answer: The main products of IPAY include digital wallets and payment processing solutions.
